remarks: Express the predicate " ` <. X , D >. ` is an extended metric space" with underlying set ` X ` and distance function ` D ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:
isms.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) $.
isms.x $e |- X = ( Base ` K ) $.
isms.d $e |- D = ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
isxms2 $p |- ( K e. *MetSp <-> ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) $.
